remote Hyades Data Collection Engine set to 'LOCAL'.

Steps to Reproduce:

Test the accessibility of the RAC from clients:

Change the config/serviceconfig.xml file by doing the following:

1. Change the allowed host to "LOCAL"
<Allow host="LOCAL"/>
2. Restart the RAC
3. Remote launch a java program from a workbench on another machine
4. Note the exception in the .log file.
